name: exercise-29
description: Favorite Fruit: Make an array of your favorite fruits, and then write a series of independent if statements that check for certain fruits in your array. • Make a array of your three favorite fruits and call it favorite_fruits. • Write five if statements. Each should check whether a certain kind of fruit is in your array. If the fruit is in your array, the if block should print a statement, such as You really like bananas!
